M

main(String[]) - 类中的静态方法 Main
 
Main - Unnamed Package中的类
 
Main() - 类的构造器 Main
 
mainContainer - 类中的变量 utm.UniversalTuringMachine
The container on which all graphical elements are placed.
mainPanel - 类中的变量 editor.UTMEditor
The main panel on which all graphical elements will be rendered.
MAX_CELLS - 接口中的静态变量 utm.Config
Maximum number of tape cells.
Move - utm中的接口
Interface that represents a general head movement.
MoveClassical - utm中的Enum Class
Head movements for a Classical Turing Machine.
MoveClassical() - enum class的构造器 utm.MoveClassical
 
moveHead(Move, boolean) - 类中的方法 utm.UniversalTuringMachine
Graphically moves the head of the current TM.
moveLeft() - 类中的方法 utm.Head
Moves the head to the previous cell of the tape.
moveLeft() - 类中的方法 utm.HeadPanel
Moves the head graphics to the previous cell of the tape.
moveRight() - 类中的方法 utm.Head
Moves the head to the next cell of the tape.
moveRight() - 类中的方法 utm.HeadPanel
Moves the head graphics to the next cell of the tape.
